title: Set Theory
content:
This is an example containing common LaTeX symbols would works in react+i18n+ts+json. The following content can help test the rendering of different symbols.

 Set: The set $A = \{1, 2, 3, 4\}$ is a simple example.

Power Set: The power set of set $A$ is $\mathcal{P}(A)$.

Mathematical Operators: Addition $+$, subtraction $-$, multiplication $\times$, division $\div$, not equal to $\neq$, less than or equal to $\leq$, greater than or equal to $\geq$.

Set Operations: Union $A \cup B$, intersection $A \cap B$, difference $A \setminus B$, complement $A^c$.

Logical Symbols: Exists $\exists$, for all $\forall$, and $\land$, or $\lor$, negation $\neg$.

Greek Letters: Alpha $\alpha$, Beta $\beta$, Gamma $\gamma$, Delta $\delta$, Omega $\omega$.

Calculus: Derivative $f'(x)$, partial derivative $\frac{\partial f}{\partial x}$, integral $\int_a^b f(x) \, dx$, double integral $\iint_D f(x, y) \, dx \, dy$.

Matrix:
A $2 \times 2$ matrix:
 $\begin{pmatrix} a & b \\ c & d \end{pmatrix}$.

Fraction: Fraction $\frac{a}{b}$.

Subscripts and Superscripts: $x_i^2$ represents the square of $x$, the $i$-th element.

Limit: Limit $\lim_{x \to \infty} f(x)$.

Summation and Product: Summation $\sum_{i=1}^n i$, product $\prod_{i=1}^n i$.

Trigonometric Functions: Sine $\sin \theta$, cosine $\cos \theta$, tangent $\tan \theta$.

Logarithms and Exponentials: $\log(x)$, $\ln(x)$, $e^x$.

Determinants:
Determinant $\begin{vmatrix} a & b \\ c & d \end{vmatrix}$.

Vectors and Dot Products: Vector $\vec{v}$, dot product $\vec{u} \cdot \vec{v}$.

This should cover all the major LaTeX symbols.
